thread.title: Utah lawmakers discuss longshot plan to repeal death penalty
thread.title_full: Utah lawmakers discuss longshot plan to repeal death penalty - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Utah lawmakers discuss longshot plan to repeal death penalty
text: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) - Some Utah lawmakers on Wednesday debated whether repealing the death penalty would be moral and just while saving the state money. But they acknowledged that capital punishment still has strong support in the conservative state and is unlikely to be repealed soon. Lawmakers on an ... ...
